title: Tell Esur
description: Tell in the northern Sharon Plain and one of the main protohistoric settlements in the northern Sharon Plain and Samaria. The tell is surrounded by the springs of 'En Esur. Archaeological remains have been found at this site from the Middle and Late Bronze Age, Iron Age, as well as the Byzantine and Ottoman Periods.

properties.description: Point based on an OpenStreetMap node representing Tel Esur.
properties.title: OSM location of Tel Esur
